name: GHRP-6
overview: A synthetic hexapeptide that stimulates growth hormone release from the pituitary gland. It is a first-generation growth hormone secretagogue known for its hunger-stimulating effects.
interactions_notes: May interact with medications affecting growth hormone or blood glucose. Consult clinician if taking diabetes medications or corticosteroids.
dosing_ranges_literature: Research protocols have used doses ranging from 100-300 mcg administered 1-3 times daily, typically on an empty stomach.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.
